thread.title: Earth Day 2018 Deals: Best Freebies, Green Incentives

author: Lisa Marie Segarra
title: Earth Day 2018 Deals: Best Freebies, Green Incentives
text:
By Lisa Marie Segarra April 20, 2018 
Earth Day 2018 is coming this weekend, but it’s not just the planet getting all the attention. Plenty of brands are also offering freebies and deals in honor of Earth Day, which falls on Sunday, April 22 this year. 
From fitness freebies to beauty product samples, here are all the best deals lined up for Earth Day 2018: Citi Bike 
Citi Bike will hold its annual Car Free NYC event from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m., which opens blocks from Times Square to Union Square for people on foot or on bike. The event takes place on Saturday, Apr. 21, just a day ahead of Earth Day 2018. New Citi Bike members can also get $25 off their annual membership. EVOS 
On Friday, Apr. 20, EVOS will give away free organic milkshakes, which are packaged with sustainable materials. Their locations also get 50% off of their energy from sustainable wind power. IKEA 
For Earth Day 2018, IKEA will hold a Make Room for Nature event on Saturday, Apr. 21, and Sunday, Apr. 22, from 9:30 a.m. to 4 p.m. There will be workshops, giveaway, discounts and coupons available for the Earth Day weekend. Kiehl’s 
For Earth Day 2018, you can get four deluxe samples on Kiehl’s orders $65 and up and a free water bottle for orders of $100 or more. The offer ends lasts through Sunday, Apr. 22. National Parks 
The National Park System doesn’t just celebrate Earth Day in April. In fact, Apr. 21 through April 29 is National Park Week. The start of the week also kicks off with free admission to National Parks on Apr. 21, and Earth Day marks the 50th anniversary of the National Trails and Wild & Scenic Rivers Systems. Origins 
For Earth Day 2018, Origins is giving out an Earth Month tote and a super deluxe sample of its Plantscription Anti-Aging Power Serum free with purchases of $45 or more. Staples 
Bringing in unwanted electronics for recycling at Staples will get its Rewards members $10 off a purchase of $35 or more. The Earth Day deal lasts from Sunday, Apr. 22 to Saturday, April 28. Wegmans 
Wegmans will have a reusable bag exchange as part of its Food You Feel Good About event on Saturday, Apr. 21 from 11 a.m. to 3 p.m. Customers can bring in plastic bags and get a coupon for a free reusable one. Youfit Health Clubs 
Youfit will host an Earth Day 2018 Open House on Monday, Apr. 23 with free workouts, group classes and giveaways for water bottles, shirts and bags. Some locations will also host a Glow Stick Cycle Party. SPONSORED FINANCIAL CONTENT
